data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 3, At Ennio Tardini, Juventus are penalized for being offside.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Juventus throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 4, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Juventus's Matthijs De Ligt is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
In the minute 5, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Parma Calcio's Hernani gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
In the minute 7, Free kick Juventus.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, In Parma Parma Calcio's Andreas Cornelius is caught offside.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Juraj Kucka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Parma Calcio.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, In Parma Juventus drive forward through Rodrigo Bentancur. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Juventus throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 23, Goal! Juventus have got their heads in front thanks to a Dejan Kulusevski strike.
Great play from Alvaro Morata to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 26, Goal! Cristiano Ronaldo extends Juventus lead to 0-2 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Alvaro Morata.
Throw-in for Juventus at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 29, Cristiano Ronaldo for Juventus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
Throw-in Juventus.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Parma Calcio close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Simone Iacoponi for Parma Calcio drives towards goal at Ennio Tardini. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Parma Calcio.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Juventus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Parma.
Alvaro Morata (Juventus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Danilo (Juventus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 41, Jasmin Kurtic of Parma Calcio is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Throw-in Juventus.
In the minute 44, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the away team a throw-in.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
Leonardo Bonucci of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
The first-half has come to a close in Parma.
Gianpaolo Calvarese has blown to start the second-half.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Gervinho with Yann Karamoh. This is the first substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
Goal! Cristiano Ronaldo extends Juventus's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 48, Aaron Ramsey with an assist there.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio drives forward and Juraj Kucka gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In Parma, Danilo of Juventus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Leonardo Bonucci (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 55, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 58, Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Parma Calcio goal kick.
Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a free kick to Juventus.
The home team replace Simone Iacoponi with Maxime Busi.
Gianpaolo Calvarese awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Fabio Liverani (Parma Calcio) is making a third substitution, with Wylan Cyprien replacing Juraj Kucka.
Fabio Liverani is making the team's fourth substitution at Ennio Tardini with Roberto Inglese replacing Andreas Cornelius.
In the minute 62, Juventus are coming forward and Alvaro Morata gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Juventus are pushing forward but Rodrigo Bentancur's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 64, Parma Calcio's Bruno Alves gets in a shot on goal at Ennio Tardini. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Parma Calcio's Hernani breaks free at Ennio Tardini. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
In the minute 68, Gianpaolo Calvarese signals a Parma Calcio throw-in in Juventus's half.
Federico Bernardeschi is on a sub for Aaron Ramsey for Juventus.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, Juventus have a goal kick.
Parma Calcio are whistled for offside.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 71, Parma Calcio drive upfield and Riccardo Gagliolo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Juventus defender.
Juventus drive forward but Alvaro Morata is judged offside.
Parma Calcio's Riccardo Gagliolo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, Gianpaolo Calvarese awards Juventus a goal kick.
Juventus's Alvaro Morata has run offside.
Roberto Inglese for Parma Calcio is whistled offside.
In the minute 76, Juan Cuadrado is replacing Leonardo Bonucci for Juventus at Ennio Tardini.
Andrea Pirlo is making the team's third substitution at Ennio Tardini with Manolo Portanova replacing Weston McKennie.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Parma Calcio are coming forward and Wylan Cyprien gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Juventus at Ennio Tardini.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juventus make their fourth substitution with Federico Chiesa replacing Cristiano Ronaldo.
In the minute 83, Parma Calcio have a dangerous throw-in.
Manolo Portanova of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Gianpaolo Calvarese.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
The home team have replaced Jasmin Kurtic with Gaston Brugman. This is the fifth substitution made today by Fabio Liverani.
Alvaro Morata heads in to give Juventus a 0-4 lead at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 86, Federico Bernardeschi instrumental with a fine assist.
Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Free kick in a good position for Parma Calcio!
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Corner awarded to Parma Calcio.
Throw-in Parma Calcio.
At Ennio Tardini the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Parma Calcio.
That's full-time at Ennio Tardini. The final score is 0-4.
